text: Antonios I Naguib (in Arabic أنطونيوس الأول نجيب; 18 March 1935 – 28 March 2022) was an Egyptian cardinal. He was the Coptic Catholic Patriarch emeritus of Alexandria from 2006 until 2013. He was also the Bishop of Minya from 1977 until 2002. Naguib died on 28 March 2022 in Cairo, Egypt at the age of 87.الكنيسة الكاثوليكية بمصر تودع الأنبا أنطونيوس نجيب ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2022 deaths Category:People from Alexandria Category:Eastern Catholic bishops Category:Cardinals of the Roman Catholic Church
title: Antonios Naguib
